Question: Integrated Computer Solutions (ICS) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Integrated Computer Solutions (ICS)

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Showcasing software solutions for the medtech industry
- Demonstrating a new in-vehicle infotainment (IVI) system demo built with Flutter for sponsor Toyota
- Partnered with Automotive Grade Linux to create the IVI demo
- Exhibiting at Digital Health Pavilion, booth 8367, North Hall, LVCC
- New Flutter-based IVI showcased at booth 4765, West Hall, LVCC
